basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2016 by David Hornbeek for the Tres Amigos. Scholarships are awarded to a student in the Jazz Studies program. Student must be full-time undergraduate of sophomore level and above or graduate student with a minimum 2.0+ GPA. Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
